ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] http header option for arcreader
ygData.msgSnippet: No such feature Frank.  Add it if you need it.  Or subclass ARCReader to add your header option  (This should be easier to do after recent refactoring). St.Ack

No such feature Frank.  Add it if you need it.  Or subclass ARCReader to 
add your header option  (This should be easier to do after recent 
refactoring).
St.Ack

Frank McCown wrote:
>
> The arcreader tool has the ability to either output a resource with its
> http header or without it. There doesn't appear to be an option to just
> print the http header. (For me this would be very useful.)
>
> Would it make sense to have a -f=header option so just the http header
> would be displayed? Or is there another strategy for getting this that
> I'm unaware of?
>
> Thanks,
> Frank
>
>
